description:
After millions played the first 3 parts of "Croc's World" itÂ´s now time for "Croc's World 4"!
"Croc's World 4" is a classical platformer with a lot of new enemies and new twists!

It features:
+ 60 incredible levels on 4 islands!
+ 2 new characters to play: Kangaroo "Roodie" and "Baby Croc"
+ 2 new vehicles: submarine and helicopter
+ Nice graphics!
+ 6 different themes!
+ Many challenging enemies
+ 4 evil endbosses
name: Croc's World 4
